author: nspiegelberg
msg: Fixing a small issue in rolling restart patch
Summary: Forgot to change the ruby script name when calling it from
hbase-daemon.sh. Also modified a debug feature, at Kannan's suggestion.
Test Plan: Tested on dev server. Plus, no functionality changes since dark

author: nspiegelberg
msg: Clearly report leaked monitored tasks and aborted tasks in the Task Monitor
The current reporting of task leaks and aborted tasks is inaccessible and
sometimes nonexistent. This patch improves reporting to be clear, changes the
color-coding for aborted tasks in the JSP task monitor, and provides a color key
to clearly explain to the user which state each row is in.
Additionally, one source of leaked tasks is patched up in store compactions by
aborting at the proper time rather than leaking the task.
Test Plan: Compiled and ran on dev server.

author: nspiegelberg
msg: After committing HBASE-3620, Ted Yu noted that we might not be
setting up our thread pool properly and actually running with just one
thread.  Tried making his modification when we experienced HBCK latency
problems & this significantly sped up processing time.
Test Plan:  - bin/hbase hbck  # on prod cluster

author: nspiegelberg
msg: Fix printing empty branch name for svn repository
There is an additional space for one assignment statement in the script.
I remember that I have fixed this bug locally in my svn branch
but forgot to check in back for this diff: https://phabricator.fb.com/D302437
Test Plan: tested on my dev server

author: nspiegelberg
msg: Adjusted the heap size constant of Store class to pass the unit test.
The unit test TestHeapSize has been failing because some fields were added to
the Store class without the heapSize function being properly adjusted.
